data.title: Director King Vidor and grandchildren
data.meta_description: Title supplied by cataloger.Director King Vidor stands next to his grandchildren, Robin Lee Adams and John King Adams. They are the children of Vidor's daughter, Suzanne and developer Morgan Adams, Jr. Photograph dated August 30, 1956.
